definitions.definition: Generally warm , approachable and easy to relate with in character .
Having an easy or accepting relationship with something.
examples: the use of environmentally friendly packaging

definitions.definition: Compatible with , or not damaging to (the compounded noun).
examples: The cobbled streets aren't very bike- friendly .
Organic farms only use soil- friendly fertilisers.
Our sandwiches are made with dolphin- friendly tuna.

definitions.definition: Promoting the good of any person; favourable; propitious.
Of or pertaining to friendlies ( friendly noun sense 2, below). Also applied to other bipolar confrontations, such as team sports.
examples: The soldier was killed by friendly fire.

definitions.definition: Being or relating to two or more natural numbers with a common abundancy .

main_definition: Generally warm , approachable and easy to relate with in character .
secondary_definitions: Having an easy or accepting relationship with something.
( in compounds ) Compatible with , or not damaging to (the compounded noun).
Promoting the good of any person; favourable; propitious.
( usually military ) Of or pertaining to friendlies ( friendly noun sense 2, below). Also applied to other bipolar confrontations, such as team sports.
( number theory ) Being or relating to two or more natural numbers with a common abundancy .
